api.lib.preprocessing package

Package contents

Modules

api.lib.preprocessing.initializers module

Contains simple functions for generating arrays with numbers.

api.lib.preprocessing.initializers.kaiming_initializer(shape)

Kaiming(or He) initialization.

Parameters

shape – size of the array

api.lib.preprocessing.initializers.ones_initializer(shape, *args, **kwargs)

Get array of ones.

Parameters

shape – size of the array

api.lib.preprocessing.initializers.rnormal_initializer(shape)

Get random array from the “standard normal” distribution.

Parameters

shape – size of the array

api.lib.preprocessing.initializers.xavier_initializer(shape)

Xavier(or Glorot) initialization.

Parameters

shape – size of the array

api.lib.preprocessing.initializers.zeros_initializer(shape, *args, **kwargs)

Get array of zeros.

Parameters

shape – size of the array
